review: Just play it, you'll understand why people love this game so much.
Game is great... Just a very poor port...worse than its predecessor (FFXIII). Even a high end PC will have moments were it struggles.
It's good to see that SE took time with this port and made it way better then its predecessors by a long shot. 1. Actual graphic options2. IT CAN RUN AT 60 FPSBest port thus far by SE
This was actually a great game, though it was short I still enjoyed the story, i like how you could decide and make choices in the game. Loved the art that was used in this game :D 10/10 :D
